Articles.Content: Hey guys, this is my new Gaming rig, and this should allow me to max out KSP on 1920x1080p res and it will be more beautiful than ever.

1: Congrats!

2: Specs?

l

AMD Athlon II X4 750K

Asus R7 260X

Crucial Ballistix Tactical 8GB

1.0Tb Western Digital Caviar Blue

MSI FM2-A75MA-E35 Motherboard

Lite-on DVD Burner

Windows 7

Corsair CX600 PSU

Rosewill Challenger Mid Tower ATX Gaming Computer case

l

AMD Athlon II X4 750K

Asus R7 260X

Crucial Ballistix Tactical 8GB

1.0Tb Western Digital Caviar Blue

MSI FM2-A75MA-E35 Motherboard

Lite-on DVD Burner

Windows 7

Corsair CX600 PSU

Rosewill Challenger Mid Tower ATX Gaming Computer case

You could have gone with a 430w PSU, still would have had room for over clocking ur GPU and would have saved $30-$40
Sad to say, but until unity supports 64bit/multicore. High end hardware will never shine with this game. Always nice to have a strong gpu however. Nice setup.

Sad to say, but until unity supports 64bit/multicore. High end hardware will never shine with this game. Always nice to have a strong gpu however. Nice setup.

Thank you.

If you built that system with KSP in mind, you should have gone with Intel. An i3 would be better than that Athlon II... KSP has no multithreading capability so when it comes down to power per core, Intel wins every time.

If you built that system with KSP in mind, you should have gone with Intel. An i3 would be better than that Athlon II... KSP has no multithreading capability so when it comes down to power per core, Intel wins every time.

Yeh, but when the multithreaded support update comes out, it'll work great.
